                                         CORAM : REVATI MOHITE DERE &
                                                 PRITHVIRAJ K. CHAVAN, JJ.

                                         DATE      : 12th DECEMBER 2022

                P.C. :

1. Learned Counsel for the appellants in Criminal Appeal Nos.1080 of 2019; 1488 of 2018; 1490 of 2018; 1493 of 2018; 1177 of 2019; 707 of 2019 and 944 of 2013 state that they will file their written submissions in the registry, within two weeks from today. They seek extension of time of two weeks to file the written submissions. Time granted by way of last chance.

2. The said written submissions to be filed in the registry, within two weeks from today with an advance copy to the other side.

3. Stand over to 5th January 2023. To be placed under the caption 'For Direction', for fixing date of hearing. PRITHVIRAJ K. CHAVAN, J. REVATI MOHITE DERE, J. N. S. Chitnis 10/10
